name: Shanbay
long_description:
# Wox-Shanbay

wox的扇贝插件，主要用于查词，添加单词到词库

## 使用

首次加词会跳转到授权页面，确认授权后复制如下到wox

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/matrixcloud/wox-shanbay/master/Images/step1.png)

然后你就可以愉快地把查询到的单词添加到词库了

![](https://github.com/matrixcloud/wox-shanbay/blob/master/Images/step2.png?raw=true)

> 授权的时候一定要等wox反应过来，否则token保存会出现问题。
> 你也可以直接打开插件目录把创建token文件把如下内容添加进去

``` shell
access_token=RPAKq1pZgTvIqmyXoaYFypFSiOUuZY&token_type=Bearer&state=123&expires_in=2592000&scope=read+write
```
## 注意

如果你使用自定义的python路径，请安装requests库pip install requests

## 感谢

- [xinshangshangxin](https://github.com/xinshangshangxin)

name: 有道翻译-单词记录
description: 有道翻译，附加单词自动记录功能
long_description:
# 有道翻译

利用有道智云 `demo` 页面接口，实现多语言翻译，自动记录查询单词

## 功能

1. 点击发音
1. 点击复制
1. 单词收藏
1. 无限制调用
1. 无需要开发者 **key**

## 单词收藏

在 **wox** 插件目录下会生成 `record.csv`，**自动记录** 每次查询的单词以及对应解释

## 依赖

1. `Python3.x`
2. 第三方库 `pyperclip`

All searches are case insensitive.

name: WinampPlugin
description: Plugin for adding tracks to current winamp playlist
long_description:
# Commands

wa: default way to use the plugin  
wa setmusicfolder [correct-root-folder-of-your-music]: sets your beloved music folder (Only one, I hope, that you don't have more music folders)  
wa setwinampexe [correct-path-to-your-winamp.exe]: sets your beloved winamp.exe  
wa [funny-search-term]: search for folders and music files in it in your set music folder  

# Functionality

If you have a well structured music folder (with folders named as artist and album), you can search for them and all music files in it. 
For example the query "wa Ste Wil Hand" would find my "Steven Wilson"-folder, then find the "Hand. Cannot. Erased."-folder (and would kick the "Steven Wilson"-folder out of the results, because the word "Hand" ist not in it. Now, the results are the "Hand. Cannot. Erased."-folder and all containing music files.

With Enter, the selected folder with all containg music files or the selected music file will go directly in your current Winamp playlist. If Winamp hasn't been started yet, Winamp will start and add it to the playlist. With Shift + Enter, you can choose to directly play the selected thing. This will clear your current Winamp playlist, add the selected folder/music file to the playlist and play it.

# Sidenote
The plugin may need a bit longer to search the first time, because it needs to cache the specified music folder after every start of Windows. 


**Update 1.1:**  
- Changed default path of winamp-exe and music folder to NOT_DEFINED
- Put initial start fix in a thread, so that Wox does not need ~20 seconds to start anymore because of that

name: Alias
long_description:
# 说明

## [Wox.Plugin.Alias](https://github.com/frcoder-lh/Wox.Plugin.Alias)
Wox的插件：为Wox中的命令提供自定义别名，Alias Plugin for Wox

## 使用说明：
0. 安装：直接使用命令自动安装（在Wox中输入wpm install Alias），或者手动下载安装（将Wox.Plugin.Alias文件夹拷贝到{WoxDirectory}\Plugins目录下，并重启Wox）；
1. 默认快捷键为a，可以在设置中修改；
2. 设置别名：a set {alias}={order}，例如 a set sql=navicat.exe，即设置成功；
3. 使用别名：a {alias}，例如 a sql，即可打开navicat.exe程序。


>注：[Wox](http://www.getwox.com/)是一款Windows下的快速启动工具，用以提高人们对计算机的操作效率。

name: Recall
description: A simple recalling app for wox
long_description:
# wox-Recall

A wox plugin - Recall for Future.
https://github.com/ZzzGin/wox-recall

## Description:

Our time is valuable. Our brain hard disk is valuable. And **that's why** I create this little plugin on WOX to help us recall some trivial things.

## Usages:
For example, if you(I) don't want to put your(my) school ID number in your(my) precious brain hard disk but you(I) still need it:
1. Download [Wox](http://www.wox.one/) and install it.
2. Type "wpm install Recall" and install the Plugin
3. **"Alt+space"** to call out Wox.
4. **"recall -a {key} {value}"** to add a key-value pair. If key exists, do nothing.
5. **"recall {key}"** to query a key. This key will be treated as this ".\*k.\*e.\*y.\*"(a regular expression). 
6. Select a result and hit Enter. The value will **be copied to clipboard**.
7. **"recall -d {key}"** to delete a key. This key should be exactly the same to the one in stored file.
8. **"recall -u {key} {new_value}"**. If key NOT exists, do nothing.
9. **"recall -r {RE}"**. Query in reqular expression.
10. **"recall -h"**. Get a help.
11. **"recall ."** - Get all the list.
12. To clear all the items, just go to the folder and replace all the stuff in "items.json" to "{}".
###
![Example](https://github.com/ZzzGin/wox-recall/raw/master/Images/recall.gif)

name: PAC Tool
long_description:
## 帮你快速添加url到v2rayN的自定义pac列表

## Wox
1. 下载[Wox](http://www.wox.one/)

2. Clone本项目到Wox插件目录

3. 修改插件配置文件config.json
```
{
    "v2rayN-path":"D:/Other/v2rayN-Core" //指定v2rayN的路径
}
```
4. 重启Wox

5. Wox命令行输入pac [your url]


## 命令行
```
python ./script.py your_url
```

name: DateTimeFormatter
description: Format date and time using particular standard date and time format specifiers.
long_description:
# Wox.Plugin.DateTimeFormatter
[DateTimeFormatter](http://www.wox.one/plugin/374) is a Wox Plugin written in C# to format date and time with specifiers.

## Usage
Enter the keyword `dt` then type particular [standard date and time format specifiers](https://rebrand.ly/t57dtcr). Formatted date and time are previewed in Wox results. You can copy the result in the clipboard.

```
dt dddd, dd MMMM yyyy
```

## Install
```
wpm install DateTimeFormatter
```

name: Wox.Plugin.Bmi
long_description:
# Wox.Plugin.Bmi

`Wox.Plugin.Bmi` is a BMI Calculator for [Wox](http://www.wox.one/).

## How to install?

```wpm install Wox.Plugin.Bmi```

## What is BMI?

> Body mass index (BMI) is a measure of body fat based on height and weight that applies to adult men and women.

## BMI Categories Of China

| Categories    | BMI       |
| ------------- | --------- |
| Underweight   | <18.5     |
| Normal weight | 18.5–23.9 |
| Overweight    | 24–27.9   |
| Obesity       | >28       |

name: Thesaurus
long_description:
## Description
A plugin that allows you to look-up any word from "Big Huge Thesaurus" (http://words.bighugelabs.com). This is great if you do a lot of writing - allowing you to stay in flow whilst spicing up your language with Wox's heads-up display. 

## First things
Please sign-up here for your own free API key: http://words.bighugelabs.com/api.php and edit the "main.py" file entering your API key value against the "API_KEY" constant.

## Usage
* Simply enter the letter "t" followed by the word you're searching for.
* The results are ordered by word class, and grouped by relationship type, such as "synonyms", "antonyms", and "similar terms".
* The search only begins for words with 3 or more characters.
* When words return many results, these are wrapped across multiple lines.

## Notes
This is a Python plug-in and requires that [Python](https://www.python.org/downloads/) is installed and in your "Path" variable. Although Wox states that it comes with a Python environment, on Windows, none of the Python plug-ins worked for me. So I installed Python and manually set the path variable, as shown [here](https://www.pythoncentral.io/add-python-to-path-python-is-not-recognized-as-an-internal-or-external-command/).

Update:
* I didn't have to set Python in the path - I can now set in from the Wox settings.
* Installing this on a new PC, I had to go to the Command Prompt and manually install the Python "requests" library - which is a dependancy:
```python -m pip install requests```

name: Alias Open
Taobao Search
description: Search via Taobao, and get live keyword suggestions
long_description:
[Checkout at Github](https://github.com/SR2k/wox-taobao-search)

# Wox Taobao search plugin

The Taobao search plugin for Wox, lets you search [Taobao](https://www.taobao/com) directly using [Wox](https://github.com/Wox-launcher/Wox/).

## Abilities

- Search Taobao
- Live search suggestions from Taobao

## Install

### Option 1

In your Wox search box, use the `wpm` command:

```
wpm install Taobao Search
```

### Option 2

Clone the repo:

```
git clone https://github.com/SR2k/wox-taobao-search.git
```

Then copy the folder to your Wox plugin directory (usually `C:\Users\{username}\AppData\Local\Wox\{wox-version}\Plugins`).

## Usage

Use keyword `tb` to trigger the plugin, or set a new trigger at Wox settings page.

# Wox 淘宝搜索插件

[Wox](https://github.com/Wox-launcher/Wox/) 的[淘宝](https://www.taobao/com)搜索插件。


## 功能

- 搜索淘宝
- 实时从淘宝获取搜索建议

## 安装方法

### 方法一

在 Wox 搜索框中使用 `wpm` 命令：

```
wpm install Taobao Search
```

### 方法二

克隆整个仓库:

``` cmd
git clone https://github.com/SR2k/wox-taobao-search.git
```

然后将整个文件夹拷贝到 Wox 的插件目录即可（一般是 `C:\Users\{用户名}\AppData\Local\Wox\{Wox 版本}\Plugins`）

## 使用

使用关键字 `tb` 来触发插件，你也可以在 Wox 的设置页设置其他关键字。

name: Base Converter
description: Convert values from one base to another (for example decimal to hexadecimal, etc.)
long_description:
Allow to convert any base (from 2 to 36) to any other base (from 2 to 36).

 # Example base 16 -> base 10

```
base 16->10 1ec
```

Result:
* **base 16->10 1ec : 492**
* [1ec] expressed in hexadecimal correspond to [492] in decimal

If you select the line, it will copy the string "492" to the clipboard and close Wox

 # Example base 12 -> base 7

```
base 12->7 b45a0
```

Result:
* **base 12->7 b45a0 : 2001414**
* [b45a0] expressed in base 12 correspond to [2001414] in base 7

If you select the line, it will copy the string "2001414" to the clipboard and close Wox

Example Usage: short https://google.com/ Results in https://0x0.st/_O Required modules: pyperclip, pyshorteners pip install pyperclip pyshorteners

name: Auto Direct Translate
description: Translate between english and any other language (IT by default)
long_description:
# Translate
Plugin for [Wox](http://www.getwox.com/) that translates between english and any other language.

![Translate](https://i.ibb.co/fFjKB2F/Plugin-In-Use.png)

Pressing ```Enter``` will redirect to a Google Translate page with the query.

To change your main language, replace this line in ```main.py```:
``` python
LANGUAGE = 'it'
```

## Installation
[Get Wox](http://www.getwox.com/)

Install [TextBlob](https://textblob.readthedocs.io/en/dev/contributing.html):
```
pip install textblob
```
Install [nltk](https://www.nltk.org/install.html):
```
pip install nltk
```
To install the plugin, type in Wox:
```
wpm install Auto Direct Translate
```

name: UUID-generator
long_description:
# WoX UUID generator plugin

**wox-uuid-generator** is a plugin for [WoX](http://www.wox.one) that generates random GUIDs and enables you to copy them to the clipboard

![Example](https://antonio-fasolato.github.io/wox-uuid-generator/example.png)

You can find the WoX plugin pahe [here](http://www.wox.one/plugin/106)

## Features

- Generate version 1 or 4 UUIDs
- Various output formats
- Base64 encoding

## Installation

Download [WoX](http://www.wox.one) then follow its [guide](http://doc.wox.one/en/plugin/install_plugin.html) to download a plugin.

If you want to manually download a release, head to the [releases](https://github.com/antonio-fasolato/wox-uuid-generator/releases) section.

## Usage

Launch WoX (<kbd>alt</kbd>+<kbd>space</kbd> by default) and type `uuid`. 

Various elements will appear with a new random generated UUID. Each element, when selected (<kbd>enter</kbd> or click), will copy to the clipboard the corresponding UUID with the selected format (uppercase, lowercase, with or without braces, with or without hyphens)

The plugins has various options:

- `<any number>` - generate that many UUIDs instead of a single one. The UUIDs will be copied to the clipboard separated by a newline
- `b` - encodes the UUIDs in base64
- `v1` - generates [version 1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Universally_unique_identifier#Version_1_(date-time_and_MAC_address)) UUIDs

### Examples

```
uuid b 3
```

Generates 3 UUIDs encoded in Base64

```
uuid v1 50
```

Generates 50 version 1 UUIDs

## Build

The plugin has been created in Visual Studio 2017 Community. Simply open the solution and build it, it has no particular dependencies apart from Wox.Plugin

name: PRPR Clean
long_description:
# Wox.Plugin.PRPR Clean

Auto clean PRPR cache pictures.

This script depends on **data** to clean PRPR cache, it will clean up all the cache **one week ago**.


## Example

### Before

Look this, it created at **2018-8-13**.
Now **2018-10-31**, it already had around **4.5GB** files only **two and a half months**.

> ![screenshots](https://github.com/Zeroto521/Wox.Plugin.PRPR-Clean/raw/master/Images/Wallpaper.png) 
> ![screenshots](https://github.com/Zeroto521/Wox.Plugin.PRPR-Clean/raw/master/Images/Lockscreen.png)

### After

**Cleaning**, now.

> ![screenshots](https://github.com/Zeroto521/Wox.Plugin.PRPR-Clean/raw/master/Images/zero_20181031_223337.png)

## Setting

Two parameters can config.

1. PATH

    > PRPR's local path.

1. LIMIT_DAYS (default 7 days)

    > How long apart from now and delete it.

### Step

1. Install `Wox`.
1. Install `Wox.Plugin.PRPR-Clean`.
1. Open the **Plugin** folder.
1. Open the **clean.py** file.
1. Find the **parameters** and change it.

## Attention

This script will **DELETE** all caches which match the config.

## Requirements

`Python3.x`

## Reference

When dealing with **byte's unit**, using this [code](https://www.cnblogs.com/misspy/p/3661770.html).

## Other

You must open `Wox` and key in `cls` every time, troublesome.

An auto-cleaning function may be the PRPR's function, not others.
So, this script is **temporary**.

---

Today(**2018-11-01**) PRPR update and add **auto-cleaning** function.

![update](https://github.com/Zeroto521/Wox.Plugin.PRPR-Clean/raw/master/Images/zero_20181101_110925.png)

So, this script is time to **end**.

name: News
description: Shows news from feeds of your choise
long_description:
Get the latest news from several medias around the world; 

Type 'news' to get all latest news, or search for anything specific by typing 'news search'.
Filter your feeds by using 'news settings'.

name: Steam Account Switcher
description: Switch your steam account using TcNo Account Switcher
long_description:
# Wox - Plugin for Steam Account Switcher

## Inspiration
I have been using [TcNo's Acc Switcher](https://github.com/TcNobo/TcNo-Acc-Switcher) for a while and it has been very useful to me. It basically allows quickly switching between your steam accounts. I wanted to switch account faster using Wox.

## Requirements
This is a Wox plugin so it requires Wox to be installed, you can check [Wox.one](http://www.wox.one/) for an easy setup.

This plugin also requires [TcNo's Acc Switcher](https://github.com/TcNobo/TcNo-Acc-Switcher) to be installed. It is not configurable yet.

name: Bark

# Wox.Plugin.Bark

Bark for Wox.

## Bark

> Bark is an iOS App which allows you to push customed notifications to your iPhone.

More information about Bark for https://github.com/Finb/Bark.

## Attention

- You should input in your **device api key** to [constant.py](/bark/constant.py) before you key in the message.
- It is better to paste the message in Wox. If you input the message one by one, Wox would send the message one by one also. There are not **Enter** in Wox. `¯\_(ツ)_/¯ `

## Requirements

- Python3.x
- requests

name: Stock
long_description:
# Wox.Plugin.Stock
Stock plugin for Wox-launcher

## Install
Install requests & Beautiful Soup with shell.
```console
$ pip install requests
✔ Installation Succeeded
$ pip install beautifulsoup4
✔ Installation Succeeded
…
```
Install Stock with Wox.
```
wpm install Stock
```

## Custom List
Show the custom list by ```SK -ALL``` or ```SK -all```.

https://github.com/hhelibeb/Wox.Plugin.Stock/blob/master/preview/custom%20list.png

Change your custom by editing ```Wox\Plugins\Stock{GUID}\list.json```.

## Error Log
If the plugin does not work, see ```Wox\Plugins\Stock{GUID}\error.log``` for the error details.

## ToDoList
- [x] Custom Stock List.

## Development Reference
[wox-python-plugins](https://github.com/jianbing/wox-python-plugins)

name: CurrencyConverter
description: Converts from one currency to one or multiple others
long_description:
Flexible currency conversion plugin that allows to quickly get the currency exchange rate or convert an amount from one currency to one or multiple others.

#### How to use:
* Sign-up on [exchangerate-api.com](https://www.exchangerate-api.com) and get your personal private API key in your profile.
* Open the plugin settings in WoX and set your API key in the 'Your own API key of ExchangeRate API' field.
* Optionally, set your favorite comma-separated currencies list in the plugin settings. These currencies will be used if no _target currencies_ are specified by you in the WoX's query.

#### Supported commands:
* _USD to EUR[,GBP,CAD]_ - quickly shows the exchange rate from one currency to one or multiple others. See the supported currencies list __[here](https://www.exchangerate-api.com/docs/supported-currencies)__.
* _123.45 USD_ - converts the specified amount of the specified currency to the currencies that are specified in the plugin's settings (see the _Favorite currencies list_ field there).
* _123.45 USD to EUR[,GBP,CAD]_ - converts the specified amount of one currency to one or multiple others.

#### Commands format:
* Most of the conversion commands consist of the _base currency_ (comes first) and one or multiple _target currencies_ divided with a comma (with no spaces) that comes last. All the currency codes must be in a 3-digit format, like USD or EUR, and the case is not important (both _USD_ and _usd_ are supported).
* The amount value must be in decimal format, like _123_ or _123.45_. The decimal separator could be either your current currency's decimal separator or a comma, i.e. both values _123.45_ and _123,45_ are supported.
* The amount value is optional, and if not specified the 1.00 value is used.

name: Rolz Roller
description: Dice Roller utilizing the Rolz.org API
long_description:
I just started using the Wox Launcher, and think it might be my new launcher of choice. I use Rolz.org a lot for rolling dice for RPGs, and figured that a good project for a plugin was to allow the use of the API from within Wox Launcher.

## How to Use

The keyword for the roller is rolz, and it uses the same syntax shown on https://rolz.org/ - any expression shown there should work. Click the result to copy the text to the keyboard.

name: PyTest
description: Test Python language in Wox plugin.
long_description:
# Wox.Plugin.PyTest

Test Python language in Wox plugin, record some information to local replace `print` function.

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.com/Zeroto521/Wox.Plugin.PyTest.svg?token=QsyzHs7fsxMnxCs5Thps&branch=master)](https://travis-ci.com/Zeroto521/Wox.Plugin.PyTest) [![codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/Zeroto521/Wox.Plugin.PyTest/branch/master/graph/badge.svg?token=FeJvDXSKxT)](https://codecov.io/gh/Zeroto521/Wox.Plugin.PyTest)

## Installation

```bash
>>> git clone https://github.com/Zeroto521/Wox.Plugin.PyTest.git
>>> python setup.py install
```

## Examples

```python
>>> from pytest import testit
>>> testit('Somewords are here.')  # It will log `Somewords are here.` to local file.
```

## License

MIT License. [@Zeroto521](https://github.com/Zeroto521)

The plugin creates/uses cache Folder to store Playerhead for Skindisplay. Size per cached Skin <1 kB

Used APIs:
https://api.mojang.com/ and https://minotar.net/

name: Synonymer
description: Find Synonyms and Antonyms for words
long_description:
quickly obtain Synonyms and Antonyms for words

**usage:**
1. find both antonyms and synonyms: `sy [word]`
2. find antonyms: `sy [word]:a`
3. find synonyms: `sy [word]:s`
